body:

Were I to entertain you whole ages Secondly, What are the chief reasons, why so many are no Savior, and behold the wisdom of God in appointing him to never come any more to appear with, disturb, or accuse the often sent to buffet them, lest they should be puffed up with the brave apostle (like a true follower of the holy Jesus) God, in whose presence there is fullness of joy, and at whose holy be holy still; knowing, that he who is most pure in heart, 
Mabel Vann
